verbs.description: The Republican Party [V: has] paid half a million dollars to the law firm representing Hope Hicks , the former Trump aide who admitted she sometimes lied to help her then - boss Donald Trump .

[ARG0: The Republican Party] has [V: paid] [ARG1: half a million dollars] [ARG2: to the law firm representing Hope Hicks , the former Trump aide who admitted she sometimes lied to help her then - boss Donald Trump] .

The Republican Party has paid half a million dollars to [ARG0: the law firm] [V: representing] [ARG1: Hope Hicks , the former Trump aide who admitted she sometimes lied to help her then - boss Donald Trump] .

The Republican Party has paid half a million dollars to the law firm representing Hope Hicks , [ARG0: the former Trump aide] [R-ARG0: who] [V: admitted] [ARG1: she sometimes lied to help her then - boss Donald Trump] .

The Republican Party has paid half a million dollars to the law firm representing Hope Hicks , the former Trump aide who admitted [ARG0: she] [ARGM-TMP: sometimes] [V: lied] [ARGM-PNC: to help her then - boss Donald Trump] .

The Republican Party has paid half a million dollars to the law firm representing Hope Hicks , the former Trump aide who admitted [ARG0: she] sometimes lied to [V: help] [ARG1: her then - boss Donald Trump] .
